articles.title: Gavin Newsom goes on the air against Ron DeSantis as political rivalry grows

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, Yulia Kesaieva, Hannah Ritchie and Mariya Knight, CNN
articles.title: Russian forces claim to take control over Lysychansk, Ukraine's last holdout in Luhansk region
articles.description: Russia is claiming to have taken control of Lysychansk, the last city in the Luhansk region in eastern Ukraine that was still under Ukrainian control.

articles.author: Em Steck and Andrew Kaczynski, CNN
articles.title: Trump-backed Michigan secretary of state nominee said abortion is 'child sacrifice'
articles.description: Before becoming the Trump-backed Republican nominee for Michigan secretary of state, Kristina Karamo said that abortion is "child sacrifice" and a "satanic practice."

articles.title: Abortion clinics brace for influx of out-of-state patients - CNN Video
articles.description: After the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, abortion clinics in Minnesota say they are bracing for an influx of out-of-state patients. CNN's Adrienne Broaddus reports.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Some Americans are offering to help others travel out of state for an abortion. But in a post-Roe era, experts urge caution
articles.description: The heartfelt messages spread across social media within hours of the seismic Supreme Court ruling overturning Roe v. Wade: If you need assistance getting an abortion in another state, I can help.

articles.author: Liam Reilly, CNN
articles.title: Group wielding White nationalist flags march along Boston's Freedom Trail on July 4 weekend

articles.author: Rebekah Riess, Tierney Sneed and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Texas state Supreme Court issues order allowing for civil enforcement of century-old abortion ban
articles.description: The Texas Supreme Court issued an order late Friday partially granting state Attorney General Ken Paxton's request to stay a lower court order that had temporarily blocked a nearly century-old abortion ban in the state.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez, CNN
articles.title: How the climate crisis is forever changing our national parks
articles.description: When Garrett Dickman drove through Yosemite National Park early this week, he passed through a diverse band of large trees -- conifer, red fir, lodgepole pine -- and noticed a grim pattern: many of the trees were either dead or dying.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Myths about abortion and women's mental health are widespread, experts say
articles.description: In pre-counseling sessions and online, myths about what happens to a woman's mental well-being following an abortion are widespread and misleading, researchers say.

articles.author: Gabby Orr, Kristen Holmes and Melanie Zanona, CNN
articles.title: Trump weighs early 2024 launch as January 6 committee looms over his future
